channel.title: Help Portforwarding Router! Linksys WRT120N!
channel.description:
Can someone please help me?? i am trying to port forward a 718 server and when i port forward it, it keeps saying its offline, and i need help setting the sources ip, but i got the client. If you can help me i would be very appreciated! thanks!
My Skype: jesterx_greg (skype name)
~LuckyRS

item.title: Help Portforwarding Router! Linksys WRT120N!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You don’t set the source’s IP. You portforward on your router, turn the server on, then check to see if the port is forwarded correctly by going to www.canyouseeme.org (like eboone1234 said).

Read full topic

item.title: Help Portforwarding Router! Linksys WRT120N!
item.dc:creator: @eboone1234 eboone1234
item.description:
@eboone1234 wrote:

sorry im not good with port forwarding but to see if the port is actually open you can go to canyouseeme.com and you do not have to edit an ip anywhere in the source, only the client

Read full topic
